messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Welcome to the station. I'm here as Captain. Unless you're a Head of Staff, you've no authority to inform me of anything. IF you are a Head of Staff, you control your area, not someone else's. Any complaints will be sent to me first. No one enters the bridge without access or my authorization. Requests, if given respectfully, will be rendered due consideration and treated respectfully. Assistants are not to be trusted. They have no alliance to anyone but themselves. I authorize random searches on them. Have a nice day.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Clown and Mime are attempting kidnapping, stealing items nad hacking. I authorize NON LETHAL violence and restraint on them. Our crew is too small to let these two disrupt things.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Both mime and clown have been executed for several capital crimes.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I'll make a home, should we go home yay or nay?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unidentified lifesigns detected coming aboard Space Station 13. Secure any exterior access, including ducting and ventilation.
